name: Bank
description: Funds held in bank accounts, including restricted and unrestricted funds for general operations.

name: Petty Cash
description: Amount of cash held on hand for small expenditures at the end of the reporting period.

name: Cash Drawer
description: Cash float used for trading or specific projects; does not represent petty cash holdings.

name: Undeposited Funds
description: Amount of funds received but not yet deposited; an automatic feature in most accounting software systems.

name: Electronic Clearing
description: Account for unallocated or unapplied funds, typically used for electronic clearing purposes.

name: Trade Debtors
description: Gross accounts receivable owed by customers, expected to be collected within the next 12 months.

name: Trade Debtors (PoS)
description: Gross accounts receivable from customers owed to the organization through the point of sale system.

name: Less Prov'n for Doubtful Debts
description: Estimate of debts not expected to be received from outstanding debtors (also referred to as Allowance).

name: Raw Materials
description: Inventory items held for resale or manufacturing, expected to be consumed within the next financial year.

name: Finished Goods
description: Manufactured or finished goods held in inventory for resale, expected within the next financial year.

name: Trading Stock on Hand
description: Trading stock held for resale, including fundraising inventory, publications, and commercial stock.

name: Goods Shipped not Invoiced
description: Stock of items shipped to customers for which invoicing has not yet been processed.

name: Work In Process (Inventory)
description: Accumulated costs for partially completed products currently undergoing production or transformation.

name: Deposits Paid
description: Deposits held by third parties, such as for electricity or bonds, expected to be redeemed within 12 months.

name: Prepaid Expenses
description: Advance payments, such as insurance or rent, covering periods beyond the current financial year.

name: Land
description: Total value of land held for productive use or future expansion. Land is a non-depreciable asset.

name: Buildings
description: Total value of structures and buildings owned and used in the organization's operations.

name: Buildings Accum Dep
description: Total accumulated depreciation recorded to date on buildings.

name: Manufacturing Plant at Cost
description: Total value of tangible fixed assets used for production, recorded at their original cost.

name: Manufac. Plant Accum Dep
description: Total accumulated depreciation recorded to date on manufacturing fixed assets.

name: Manufacturing Equipment Cost
description: Total value of equipment used for production, recorded at its original initial cost.

name: Manufac. Equip Accum Dep
description: Total accumulated depreciation recorded to date on manufacturing equipment.

name: Furniture & Fixtures at Cost
description: Cost or fair value of furniture and fixtures installed in offices or rental properties.

name: Furniture & Fixtures Accum Dep
description: Total accumulated depreciation recorded to date on the organization's furniture and fixtures.

name: Office Equip at Cost
description: Cost or fair value of office equipment, including capitalized computers and software.

name: Office Equip Accum Dep
description: Total accumulated depreciation recorded to date on the organization's office equipment.

name: Motor Vehicles at Cost
description: Cost or fair value (if donated) of motor vehicles, including buses, owned or leased.

name: Motor Vehicles Accum Dep
description: Total accumulated depreciation recorded to date on the organization's motor vehicles.

name: Technology Equip
description: Cost or fair value of all specialized technological equipment, including capitalized IT infrastructure and servers.

name: Technology Equip Accum Dep
description: Total accumulated depreciation recorded to date on the organization's technology equipment.

name: Other Property, Plant, and Equipment
description: Cost or fair value of miscellaneous tangible long-term assets not classified elsewhere (e.g., specialised tooling, library assets).

name: Other Property, Plant, and Equipment Accum Dep
description: Total accumulated depreciation recorded to date on miscellaneous tangible long-term assets.

name: Motor Vehicle Accessories
description: Cost or fair value of significant, permanent additions and A installed on motor vehicles.

name: Motor Vehicle Accessories Accum Dep
description: Total accumulated depreciation recorded to date on significant motor vehicle accessories.

name: Credit Card
description: Balance owed on credit cards, due and payable within the next 12 months.

name: Trade Creditors
description: Gross accounts payable owed to trade creditors or suppliers at the end of the reporting period.

name: Goods Received not Billed
description: Liability for goods received from suppliers for which an invoice has not yet been issued.

name: Wages & Salaries
description: Liability for unpaid wages and salaries, typically at the end of the reporting period.

name: GST Collected
description: Gross Goods and Services Tax (GST) collected, due to the Australian Taxation Office (ATO).

name: BAS Payments
description: Payments made to the ATO for the Business Activity Statement (BAS), including GST and withholding tax.

name: GST Paid
description: Gross GST input tax credits receivable from the Australian Taxation Office (ATO).

name: Deferred GST Liability
description: Liability for deferred GST under the ATO's reporting system for GST.

name: Fuel Tax Credits
description: Balance of Fuel Tax Credits owed by the ATO to the organization or payable to the ATO.

name: WET Payable
description: Wine Equalisation Tax (WET) due and payable to tax authorities at the end of the period.

name: Import Duty Payable
description: Import duty due and payable to customs authorities at the end of the reporting period.

name: PAYG Income Tax Liability
description: Pay As You Go (PAYG) Income Tax owed by the organization to tax authorities.

name: Voluntary Withholdings Payable
description: Voluntary withholding amounts deducted from payments to employees or suppliers, not yet remitted.

name: ABN Withholdings Payable
description: ABN (Australian Business Number) withholding tax deducted, not yet remitted to the ATO.

name: Fringe Benefits Tax Liability
description: Amount of Fringe Benefits Tax (FBT) owed and payable to the tax authorities.

name: Luxury Car Tax Liability
description: Amount of Luxury Car Tax (LCT) owed and payable to the tax authorities.

name: Superannuation
description: Total superannuation contributions due and payable to superannuation funds for all employees.

name: Payroll Accruals Payable
description: Liability for accrued employee benefits such as annual leave and long service leave.

name: PAYG Withholding Payable
description: PAYG tax deducted from employees' gross salaries, not yet remitted to the ATO.

name: Child Support
description: Child support amounts deducted from employee wages that have not yet been remitted.

name: Customer Deposits
description: Deposits or advances from customers for goods or services not yet delivered.

name: Other Current Liabilities
description: All other current liabilities not included elsewhere, including funds held in trust for a third party.

name: Unearned Income from System
description: Revenue or income, excluding grants, received in advance that span more than the current financial year.

name: Deductions
description: Miscellaneous deductions from employee wages payable to third parties, such as medical insurance.

name: Mortgages Payable
description: Long-term component of mortgages payable by the organization, not due within 12 months.

name: Notes Payable
description: Long-term component of loans or notes payable to banks or others, not due within 12 months.

name: Other Long Term Liabilities
description: All other non-current liabilities not specifically listed, not expected to be actioned within 12 months.

name: Capital Investment
description: Contributions made by members or owners to establish or finance the organization.

name: Capital Drawings
description: Withdrawals of funds or assets made by members or owners for personal use.

name: Retained Earnings
description: Accumulated surplus or losses of the organization carried over from previous operating years.

name: Current Year Earnings
description: Surplus or deficit generated during the current financial year, carried over to retained earnings.

name: Historical Balancing
description: Default account used to balance debits and credits when the chart of accounts is initially loaded.

name: Sales Product #1
description: Sales revenue for product number one, which may act as a header account for sub-activities.

name: Sales Product #2
description: Sales revenue for product number two, representing market-value transactions with a material benefit.

name: Sales Product #3
description: Sales revenue for product number three, representing regular product or service transactions.

name: Wholesale Sales
description: Revenue from wholesale sales of goods made by the organization to other resellers.

name: Consignment Sales
description: Revenue generated from the sale of goods held on consignment by the organization.

name: Freight Income
description: Revenue collected by the organization for transportation and freight charges billed to customers.

name: Late Fees Collected
description: Revenue derived from late fees collected from customers or members of the organization.

name: Miscellaneous Income
description: Miscellaneous or sundry income not included in any other specific income categories.

name: Fuel Tax Credits
description: Fuel Tax Credits received from the ATO by the organization, accounted for as income.

name: Cost of Goods Sold #1
description: Cost of purchasing the first product or service sold by the organization during the year.

name: Cost of Goods Sold # 2
description: Cost of purchasing the second product or service sold by the organization during the year.

name: Cost of Goods Sold # 3
description: Cost of purchasing the third product or service sold by the organization during the year.

name: Wholesale Cost of Sales
description: Cost of goods sold wholesale by the organization during the financial year.

name: Consignment Cost of Sales
description: Cost of purchasing goods sold on consignment by the organization during the year.

name: Wages for Production Labour
description: Direct wage costs associated with production labour or manufacturing of goods sold.

name: Materials & Supplies
description: Cost of raw materials or supplies directly used to produce the goods sold.

name: Freight
description: Cost of transportation and freight relating to goods purchased, not sold, by the organization.

name: Other Costs
description: Other direct costs, such as production utilities, associated with the goods sold.

name: Advertising
description: Marketing, advertising, and promotion fees for the organization's events or services.

name: Car & Truck Expenses
description: Vehicle operating costs, including fuel, repairs, maintenance, insurance, and registration.

name: Commissions Paid
description: Commissions paid to employees or sales agents for sales or services rendered.

name: Depreciation Expense
description: Depreciation expense calculated for the current year on all fixed assets.

name: Discounts Given
description: Discounts granted to customers for early or bulk payment, resulting in reduced revenue.

name: Discounts Taken
description: Discounts received from suppliers for early payment of accounts payable.

name: Exchange Rate Loss
description: Loss realized on foreign currency transactions due to changes in exchange rates.

name: Exchange Rate Gain
description: Gain realized on foreign currency transactions due to favorable changes in exchange rates.

name: Freight Paid
description: Postage, stamping, franking, and courier costs incurred by the organization, excluding fundraising.

name: Insurance
description: Costs of all insurances, including accident, building, and contents, excluding vehicles and employees.

name: Overdraft Interest
description: Interest paid on the organization's bank overdraft, treated as an interest expense.

name: Mortgage Interest
description: Interest paid on the organization's mortgages for properties that are owned.

name: Other Interest
description: Other interest paid or interest penalties incurred by the organization during the year.

name: Late Fees Paid
description: Late fees or penalties paid by the organization for overdue invoices or obligations.

name: Machinery & Equipment
description: Repairs and maintenance of machinery, equipment, and tools (excluding motor vehicles).

name: Other Business Property
description: Maintenance and repair costs for other owned business properties, excluding rentals.

name: Legal & Professional Services
description: Fees paid for legal services, along with consulting and professional services.

name: Office Expenses
description: Administrative costs related to printing, stationery, and office supplies.

name: Staff Amenities
description: Tea room supplies and amenities purchased for the organization's staff and visitors.

name: Superannuation
description: Superannuation expenses for salaried or casual staff, including mandatory contributions.

name: Wages & Salaries
description: Total gross wages and salaries paid to permanent and casual staff, excluding employee benefits.

name: Workers' Compensation
description: Amounts paid for workers' compensation on behalf of the organization's employees.

name: Other Employer Expenses
description: All other employment costs, such as employer taxes, not included in other accounts.

name: Child Support
description: Cost of administering child support deductions within the payroll system.

name: Repairs
description: Costs of repairs and maintenance for buildings, equipment, and office furniture.

name: Shrinkage/Spoilage
description: Loss of inventory due to theft, breakage, or obsolescence, excluding bad debts written off.

name: Supplies
description: Costs of consumable supplies for direct support to clients or programs.

name: Taxes
description: All rates, taxes, and levies incurred by the organization from authorities.

name: Telephone
description: All telephone, mobile, and fax charges, including associated internet costs.

name: Gas
description: Cost of gas paid by the organization for the buildings it occupies (utilities).

name: Electricity
description: Cost of electricity paid by the organization for the buildings it occupies (utilities).

name: Water
description: Cost of water (including excess water) paid by the organization (utilities).

name: Travel
description: Travel expenses for staff (airfares, taxis, tolls, accommodation, and meals).

name: Meals & Entertainment
description: Deductible and non-deductible entertainment costs for staff and special events.

name: Interest Income
description: Interest income earned on unrestricted cash or banked funds, classified as operating funds.

name: Interest Expense
description: Interest paid on the organization's debt and loans, including mortgages and overdrafts.

name: Income Tax Paid
description: Income tax paid by the organization to the relevant tax authorities.

name: Fringe Benefits Tax Paid
description: Amount of Fringe Benefits Tax (FBT) paid by the organization for employee benefits.

name: Luxury Car Tax Paid
description: Amount of Luxury Car Tax (LCT) paid by the organization on the purchase of vehicles.
